vignette:
Tim Georg Heinze Xenorama
Xenorama Object Functional Overview
Performance Management
xen.app.switch - Schedule internal application processing
xen.max.quit - Shutdown or reboot the current Max application
xen.dsp.fade~ - Linear signal fade in/out.
xen.jit.fade - Linear black masking
xen.tcp.host - Exchange bangs with a remote UDP pair
xen.sys.audio~ - Control system audio outside of Max
Network Connection
xen.ip.check - Ping IP-addresses
xen.vpn.connect - Manage available VPN connections
Process Monitoring
xen.mc.hijack~ - Capture and save multichannel audio output to disk
xen.screenshot - Capture screenshots at regular intervals
